He Lei: China-US military ties should contribute to world peace

Lieutenant General He Lei said the military relationship between China and the U.S. should make a positive contribution to world peace and stability. He made the remarks in an exclusive interview with CGTN’s @Yunfei_zh during the 10th #BeijingXiangshanForum.
